response.overview: A sexy wife (Alison Rae) trusts her handsome but untrustworthy husband (Alex Legend) to interview a young college girl (Coco Lovelock) for the nanny position. This girl is so adorable Alex hires her on-the-spot. Since it’s a live-in position, the compensation leaves much to be desired but, after a brief orientation, Alex boldly suggests a way for Coco to earn some extra cash. Little does Alex know that Coco loves “anything-goes” sex. The covert arrangement begins and continues until Alex’s wife stumbles upon the illicit affair and plots to teach them both a lesson…
response.title: The Live-In Nanny
